title: Usability Design and Improvement Strategies for Online Learning Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Blended education course for practicing professionals to strengthen social sector job competencies, incorporating project-based assessment and BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three usability evaluation criteria for e-learning platforms that consider varying experience levels.
Learners can analyze user experience data to design platform improvement plans and implement them as prototypes.
Learners can propose learning module enhancements that incorporate multidimensional usability factors, such as accessibility, navigation efficiency, and interactivity.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
